items.sentence: It began to snow heavily as I got off the train.
It has been over three years since I moved here.
It started to rain as soon as we started eating.
I bet you don\'t remember the first time we met.
We\'ve known about this problem for a long time.
What\'s the best way to get to Boston from here?
Is there anyone here who hasn\'t been to Boston?
I thought you were supposed to be at school now.
I told Tom I wanted to go to Australia with him.
I told Tom that I needed to go home early today.
